question: Bring out the only correct statement in context with Uranium:Â
option1: Both U-235 and U-238 are fissile but only U-235 can sustain chain reactions
option2: Only U-235 is fissile and can sustain chain reaction but U-238 is fertile
option3: U-238 can be used in chain reactions only after extracting U-235 from it
option4: Uranium enrichment is a process where concentration of U-238 is increased using some chemical processes
answer: Only U-235 is fissile and can sustain chain reaction but U-238 is fertile
explanation: C is not correct because U-238 will support chain reactions after it is converted to plutonium-239. D is also incorrect because its concentration of U-235 that matters.
